sentence.Network_en: She was wearing the ermine toque she'd bought when her hair was yellow.
sentence.Network_cn: 她戴的貂皮无沿帽是在她头发还是黄色时买的.

sentence.Network_en: The ermine toque was alone; she smiled more brightly than ever.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有貂皮无沿帽独自呆在那里, 她笑得更加明快了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French hermine, probably from medieval Latin (mus) Armenius 'Armenian (mouse')

entry.def: Ermine is expensive white fur that comes from small animals called stoats.

means.word_mean: 1. the expensive white fur of the ermine
2. mustelid of northern hemisphere in its white winter coat
